alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant; Kay; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 11:28PM CDT until August 14 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Southeastern Grant County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1128 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Jefferson to near Billings to 5 miles west of Perry, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Ponca City, Blackwell, Perry, Tonkawa, Newkirk, Pond Creek, Garber, Morrison, Covington, Billings, Lamont, Kaw City, Red Rock, Kremlin, Breckenridge, Marland, Hunter, Fairmont, and Kildare. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
